short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your New Tab page to stay on top of your goals and deadlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accomplish is an extension for people who are driven by deadlines and goals. It overrides Google Chrome's New Tab page to show a dashboard of your current goals, days remaining until deadlines, as well as a progress bar to show time spent.

And on top of that, it shows snazzy full screen backgrounds on the New Tab page.
